title: The Bordello Girl
description: Auckland bordello owner Kitty Malloy understands men. But even she is taken aback when Silas Crawford asks her help with his young, naive wife.Twenty-three year old Thea Crawford has learnt getting married was a terrible mistake and yearns to be free of her middle-aged over-bearing husband - and his constant demands for a son.Darius is a playboy and adventurer. A favored customer at the bordello, when Thea is blackmailed into becoming one of Kitty’s girls he sweeps her off her feet. But should she listen to the others when they tell her of his reputation? Or are his feelings for her real?From New Zealand to Australia’s tropical Far North, The Bordello Girl is a story of the 1920's. Flappers and jazz. High spirits and hedonism. Friendships and betrayal.And a love that would last forever.
author: Hilary Murray
